plot: Meg spends the final 30 minutes of her life with Michael, a young man she once spent a lot of time with in a cabin.
title: Before the Cabin Burned Down
plot_es: Meg spends the final 30 minutes of her life with Michael, a young man she once spent a lot of time with in a cabin.
plot_en: Meg spends the final 30 minutes of her life with Michael, a young man she once spent a lot of time with in a cabin.
